title: Club tag creation disabled and Server Error Message in Client
body:
Hey everyone,

We noticed that some players were experiencing issues with creating club tags and clubs without tags were displaying as "null". We started to dig into this issue a bit deeper and found out that we made some back-end bug fixes to clubs earlier on the 6th that seemed to cause these additional issues.

In an effort to resolve this, we disabled the ability to create club tags, but this also caused an obscure error message to start popping up for all players talking about a processing error from the server. This error message actually doesn't actually affect anything, but is incredibly flippin' annoying.

We are working on getting a hotfix out in the near future to get this to stop appearing, but don't have an ETA just yet. We'll let everyone know if anything changes!
